q: : Larry Page to Replace Eric Schmidt as CEO AAPL: 326.72(-5.96,-1.79%)| NASDAQ: 2689.54(-14.75,-0.55%) Why extremely high resolution screens matter for Apple's next-gen iPad Substantiated rumors of the next generation iPad using a vastly higher resolution 2048x1536 display are drawing some to question why the iPad would even need such a dense pixel count, which is much higher than even Apple's 17 inch MacBook Pro, Daniel Eran Dilger reports for AppleInsider.
